mapper.select: select bno, title, bcontent, reg_date, r_cnt, cate_id, bview, user_nick from (select rownum as rn, bno, title, bcontent, reg_date, r_cnt, cate_id, bview, user_nick from tbl_board where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by bno desc) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(bno, cate_id, blike, bview, r_cnt, title, bcontent, writer, user_nick, reg_date) values( board_seq.nextval, #{cate_id}, 0, 0, 0, #{title}, #{bcontent}, #{writer}, #{user_nick}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT bno, cate_id, blike, bview, r_cnt, title, bcontent, writer, user_nick, reg_date FROM tbl_board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET cate_id = #{cate_id}, title = #{title}, bcontent = #{bcontent} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where bno > 0

select * from(SELECT BNO, LEAD(BNO,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BNO) AS next, LAG(BNO,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BNO) AS last, TITLE, LEAD(TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BNO) AS nexttitle, LAG(TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BNO) AS lasttitle
FROM tbl_board order by BNO DESC) WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET bview = bview + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
update tbl_board set blike = blike + 1 where bno=#{bno}
